description: the program worked fine but after upgrading it tells me that any of my 3 smartphones seems to be in use by another app. Same issue after removing and reinstalling the program
summary: its useless itdont work at all

description:
File renaming and destination directory generation is what I was looking for. Knowing that it already downloaded a picture off my camera is also a nice touch. Won't create thumbnails until I download the pictures which is why I gave it 4 stars.

** NOTE: You need to eject your camera/phone from the file manager first or you'll get a device in use by another app error. This seems to be because the OS is blocking Rapid Photo Downloader from mounting the device.
summary: It's slick. Does just about everything my old Canon software did

description: it does not work on Oppo phones

New interface took some getting used too but after giving it a spin, it works better than the old UI.
Love it!

I have been using this app for a couple of years, with various memory cards (sorry not tried with phones or direct connection). Works great, is fast and has lots of options - I change file names to reflect camera pics came from. Interface does take a bit getting use to but once figured it out no problem. 

Damon does a great job keeping it updated and responds quickly to questions and inquiries.
This is the best and default app to transfer your photos from your camera and phone. It's smart, remembers what you already transferred and renames files/generates directories with common sense.
summary: Very easy to use and powerful

description:
The Canon EOS 600D Digital Camera appears to be in use by another application. Tried unplugging and re connect same error

The SAMSUNG Android appears to be in use by another application.

Simple to use 
Keep improving App UI (Modern)

Yes, it worked out of the box. It saw the 52 photos in the normal memory and placed them in an interface that dominates the screen and has smaller than useful thumbnails? the interface is over complicated. I would rrather be impressed by function first rather than design. 
It was difficult straight off to find my Whatsapp photos for instance? The big problem with most apps is they are aimed at the designers objective and not the users? I will be looking for something else but it will suit most people.
summary: If your photos are where they should be?

description: This is one of the best Linux photography apps period. It is so well thought out and well executed. Can configure all sorts of different combinations for folders, filenames, and importantly sync jpeg and raw images. Far more flexible than most other apps.
summary: Excellent! Well written, lovely UI, extremely configurable

description:
Simple small application that is designed after the Linux ideology (do one thing and to it well). Downloads photos in an organized way onto your disk. It downloads only new photos, you can configure the way to organize into folders. 

Wonderful App.
summary: Do one thing and do it well

description: easy to use and reliable. Great Program that i use to to semi automatical import the Pictures from the SD Card

Einmal konfiguriert importiert das Programm die Bilder zuverlässig und rasch von der SD Karte in das entsprechende Verzeichnis auf der Festplatte. Verzeichnis kann über Infos aus den Exif daten angelegt werden.
summary: Super für Import von RAW Bildern

description: Das ist das beste Fotoimporttool was ich bis jetzt nutzen konnte. Schon die Vorgängerversion war großartig. Leider gibt es das Tool nur für Linux und nicht für Mac. Kommt aber vielleicht noch.
No working it, in xubuntu.

En un principio no podía acceder a mi dispositivo y estuve por borrarlo, luego me di cuenta que quitarlo desde el administrador de archivos y ahí lo toma sin problemas. Era cosa de leer bien lo que decía el msgbox del programa.
no funcionó en ubuntu 1804

No me funcionó en Ubuntu 18.04
Desinstalada.

Funciona todo, pero le faltan funciones como "desmarcar todo"... En mi caso no había espacio donde queria descargar las imagenes y, queria descargar por grupos, pero eran muchos recursos y desmarcar de a uno se volvió poco practico. No pude probar la descarga.
J'en ai essayé une multitude, c'est de loin le plus efficace.
Il n'y a plus qu'a appuyer sur le bouton pour transférer ses images et avoir tout d'organiser automatiquement.
apparemment buggs
summary: ne détecte pas appareils photos canon

description: Позволяет загрузить фото с цифровой камеры без заморочек. Также имеется возможность настройки экспорта.
